com.bigtobster.pgnextractalt.core

Class TestContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigtobster.pgnextractalt.core.TestContext

  • public class TestContext
extends Object
    Abstract base test class that all Spring shell Test classes must extend when using a shell
    Author:
    Toby Leheup (Bigtobster)

        public static final String DUMP_DIR

        public static String buildCommand(String command,
                                  HashMap<String,String> optionValuesMap)
        Builds a command string up from a basic command plus a Hash Map of Option, Argument value pairs to get "command [--<option> < arg>]*"

        command - The base command
        optionValuesMap - The hash map of Option, Argument pairs
        Returns:
        The fully constructed command
